step1.title: Welcome to SpeedEats
step1.description: Welcome to your one-stop destination for delicious meals delivered right to your doorstep. Get ready to explore a world of culinary delights.

step2.title: Create Your Account
step2.description: Let's get started! Create your account to enjoy easy ordering, personalized recommendations, and exclusive deals. Enter your email and create a password to begin.

step3.title: Explore Restaurants
step3.description: Discover a diverse selection of restaurants offering everything from your favorite comfort foods to exotic cuisines.

step4.title: Customize Your Order
step4.description: Hungry for something specific? Customize your order with special instructions, dietary preferences.

step5.title: Checkout & Payment
step5.description: Ready to place your order? Review your selections, choose your preferred payment method, and enter your delivery address.

step6.title: Track Your Delivery
step6.description: Sit back and relax! Track your order in real-time as it makes its way to your doorstep. Get updates on the estimated delivery time and the status of your delivery driver.

step7.title: Rate & Review
step7.description: Share your feedback! Rate your meal and delivery experience to help us improve our service. Your input is valuable to us.

step8.title: Reorder Favorites
step8.description: Love what you ordered? Easily reorder your favorite meals with just a few taps. Access your order history to quickly find and reorder past favorites.

step9.title: Promotions & Discounts
step9.description: Don't miss out on great deals! Stay updated on the latest promotions, discounts, and special offers available exclusively to our app users.

step10.title: Welcome to SpeedEats
step10.description: Congratulations! You're now ready to embark on a culinary adventure with Food Delivery App. Discover new flavors, indulge in your cravings, and enjoy the convenience of food delivered to your doorstep.

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.loadAmountSubtitle: How much do you want to add to your balance?
